ok first of all
im not obsessed with joe menor! i just think hes a cool kid and super fun to tlk with, and for the record i DONT get obsessed with people! im just excited that i have a date and that i actually like joe becuase hes a gd friend and nothing more right now! if something happens later fine, but as far as i know were just friends unless he changes that. so ther haha

have a good one cuz i know i will!haha

(yummmmm)
